## Bio

I am a current PhD student at the University of East Anglia who is working on ocean current-wind interactions at the mesoscale. When I am away from the office you can find me cycling over the hills of Norfolk, or running through a muddy field.


## Education

**University of East Anglia** | Norwich, UK 

PhD | 2018 - Present

Supervisors - Dr. Xiaoming Zhai, Dr. Dave Munday, Prof. Manoj Joshi

Thesis - "Mesoscale eddy-wind interaction"

**The University of Manchester** | Manchester, UK

MSc | Applied Mathematics | 2016-2017

Dissertation - "Boundary layer separation in a non-axisymmetric container"
